description: NTS Map: 083B04Start at the Hummingbird staging area and follow the road west to Onion Lake, and then southwest up the pass and hook up with Hummingbird Creek drainage which loops back to Onion Creek.  Or, continue on to Canary Creek and come down back to Onion Creek near hummingbird falls. There is GPS data attached to this trail (see "download GPS"), which if loaded into your GPS can help you find route points.
directions: Use Ram Falls Campground, or Hummingbird staging area as a start.  The trail is shared with ATVs and horseback riders.
title: Bighorn
